title: Pressure - absolute pressure on surface of cube

content.question: Which of the following expressions is equal to the absolute pressure exerted by the fluid on the top surface of the cube?

choices.label: <math alttext="P sub atmosphere, end sub, plus rho g y" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>atm</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><mo> </mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>y</mi></math>

<math alttext="P sub atmosphere, end sub, plus rho g times open parenthesis, y minus s, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>atm</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><mo> </mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>
<math alttext="rho g times open parenthesis, y minus s, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="P sub atmosphere, end sub, plus rho g times open parenthesis, y minus s, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>P</mi><mtext>atm</mtext></msub><mo>+</mo><mo> </mo><mi>ρ</mi><mi>g</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>y</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>s</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
